Description:
AUCTION CANCELLED SOLD PRIOR
Summer is here so why build and go through all the pain and time when you can purchase this 4 bedroom plus study home that is only 2 years young, which has everything already done and all the bells and whistles attached.
Inside you'll notice the contemporary décor of this "no expense spared" home and the expansive living areas, which will give all the members of the family an opportunity to each get their own space. The gorgeous Theatre room, open plan family room and upstairs retreat are terrific in stature and will host quiet nights in watching movies or families who invite all their neighbours and friends over to enjoy a social bbq.
The kitchen has been finished with stone benches, quality 900mm S/S appliances, dishwasher, overhead cupboards and a gorgeous window splash back for all that natural light to flow through. Adjoining the kitchen is a walk in pantry for all the Jamie Oliver's of the family and for extra storage.
Overlooking the kitchen is a huge meals area, which will fit a huge kings table. Adjacent to the meals area there is a gorgeous decked alfresco area, which is separated by quality bi-fold timber doors.
Entertaining the family is easy once you step passed the bi-fold doors. You instantly know there has been a lot of time, effort and money invested in the backyard with extensive decking around the solar heated in-ground swimming pool, exposed aggregate paths and low maintenance backdrop the owners have created.
The huge master bedroom comes with a generous WIR and Ensuite, while the 2nd and 3rd bedrooms also incorporates walk in robes to accommodate the teenagers of the family.
Extras in this tremendous size home include ducted vacuum, kicker vacuum in the kitchen, double garage with remote, 3 toilets which includes a down stairs powder room, ceiling fans, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and so much more.
Located in the pristine Pasadena Estate and close to schools "public and private", shops and public transport on a 512m2 block of land this property depicts what most Australians want when they buy a home. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity
All information contained therein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.
Insights: 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Unwind in your private acreage
This is your opportunity to kick back with a glass of wine in your own quiet paradise. This stunning lifestyle property, set across 3 gorgeous acres, offers relaxing peace and quiet.
Step inside the solid family home and find a wonderful mix of formal and informal living, including a formal lounge with fireplace and a formal dining room, served by an excellent modern kitchen with chef-sized stainless appliances, as well as an informal living area.
Relax in the master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite, plus two more large bedrooms with built-in robes and a family bathroom. Entertain your friends in the large enclosed alfresco area, before taking a stroll throughout your tucked away private acreage.
Additional benefits include substantial workshops and shedding on the property (complete with three-phase power) solar power to the home and refrigerated ducted cooling and ducted heating. This secluded locale is first-rate – only 10 minutes to Cranbourne shopping and station (including the beautiful Botanic Gardens) and it's only 10 minutes down to the coast at Tooradin. Clyde Primary School is just up the road and excellent school options are nearby including St. Thomas.

Description:
Immaculate Low Maintenance Budget Buy! Under Contract!
This modern and cosy 2 year old gem positioned on a fantastic low maintenance block is absolutely perfect for First Home Buyers, Downsizers, and Investors! Located in the up and coming Pasadena Estate you will soon discover the family friendly lifestyle it preserves.
This house is the place to be, as you walk out to the front doorstep you will see the highest public park in the Clyde Area! The Hill Farm Park offers beautiful panoramic views of farm lands and the regions surrounds. Along with these great scenic views, Hill Farm Park also includes a range of features such as a farm themed playground, BBQ area, dog off-leash zone and kick-about space, making this park a popular destination for the entire community to entertain.
This impressive home offers an open plan living zone, 3 spacious bedrooms all with large built in robes, 2 separate bathrooms and a great sized laundry space. The Kitchen consists of a large walk in pantry with upgraded appliances, which overlooks into the freshly renovated backyard area. Other features include reverse cycle air conditioning, ducted heating throughout, and a fitted alarm system for your extra comfort.
This property is a must see, call Declan now on 0422 796 372 before you miss out!

Description:
Retain for Future Residential Development
Proudly presenting approx. 24 acres of prime property in the hottest suburb of South East Growth Corridor. Ideally situated only 10 minutes to central Cranbourne, proposed future Major Clyde Town Centre, Clyde train station and immediately surrounding future residential developments.
With Clyde PSP approval in about 3 years, the Advisory Committee is re-examining so called ‘Logical Inclusions’ to highly increase the possibility of including this property inside the Urban Growth Boundary, whether you are investors or developers, you cannot miss this once-off opportunity to make a significant gain on future residential development.
Extra bonus includes:
• Approx. $3000 per calendar month rental income for two houses on this property
• Approx. $2300 per calendar month Commercial lease of land for thriving agistment business
• Approx. 24 individual watered paddocks with loose boxes
• Reticulated water throughout the property
• 3 separate electricity meters
• Negotiable on long term settlement
Call Brix Cai today for a full timeline of planning re-assessment & inspections.

Description:
Build in the heart of Harteigh
TITLED & ready to build your dream home in a location your family & friends will envy. Located in one of the most prominent and sought after estates, Hartleigh offers beautiful park that not only provides a stunning outlook for neighbouring homes, but also encourages residents to gather together and enjoy the outdoors. Featuring:
- 434 sqm (approx.) land size
- Picnic areas, walking tracks and Tennis Club
- Close to proposed Railway Station
Whether it's a picnic with friends and neighbours or just a quiet, twilight stroll while the kids run around the playground, Hartleigh is about building a new community.
Call Yogi Patel on 0451 719 161 for further details!

Description:
Investors dream or first home buyer's entry
Situated right behind and within meters to Clyde Shopping Centre, is this single story residence brimful of natural light and impressive interiors and exteriors.
- Tailored for secure low-maintenance living, the property comprises an expansive open plan kitchen/family, 3 good sized bedrooms (main with en-suite), additional bathroom, separate laundry, powder room and single garage with remote control. Other prime features include premium modern flooring, ducted heating, air-conditioning & LED lighting.
- Spacious open plan kitchen with loads of cupboard space comes fully equipped with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher.
- This effortlessly stylish, well maintained and virtually in nearly new condition residence is perfectly positioned to take full advantage of the proximity to the shops, pharmacy, cafes and restaurants in Clyde Shopping Centre, with bus stop (Route 897) literally minutes away from the house - only 10 min bus ride to Cranbourne Station and only minutes to Kids On Clyde, St. Peters College Cranbourne East & St. Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary School, McDonalds (24 hours) & Coles Express service station.
This property is under long term lease until 20th June 2018 on $1,521 per month, ticks all the boxes for a smart investor or first home buyer, enquire today with Naval Singh on 0401 489 262 or Irene Baselyous on 0450 014 070.

Time to build that big dream home
Ideally located in the highly sought after "Pasadena Estate", is this 630m2 titled block, offering 18 metres frontage perfect to build a home as big as you like.
- Park Facing with scenic views
- Seconds to Hill Farm Park that features a farm-themed playground, BBQ area, dog off-leash zone and kick-about space.
- Minutes to 'Pasadena Park' which is a beautiful central feature with activities for all ages.
- Minutes to Clyde Shopping Centre (includes Coles, Cafes, Pharmacy,& restaurants)
- Minutes to Kids On Clyde (Early Learning Centre and Kindergarten)
- Short proximity to St.Peters College,Wilandra Rise Primary School
With shortage of large blocks in today's market, this rare opportunity won't last long.
Act now, call Naval Singh or Irene Baselyous now to secure this one for yourself

Description:
Family Convenience or Savy investment
Residing within the much-admired Pasadena Estate, this well presented, low-maintenance home is ideally located and cleverly designed comprised of three generous bedrooms, two bathrooms, oversized living with open plan kitchen flowing to the sizable undercover outdoor entertainment.
The well-appointed kitchen is central to the home and features 900mm stainless steel appliances and plentiful cabinetry. Accommodation needs are well and truly met with a generous master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe, followed by two remaining bedrooms benefiting from the spacious family bathroom that boasts a luxurious spa.
There is easy access to the ample pergola area which allows for entertaining throughout the year and has a backdrop of low maintenance garden. This feature packed home also offers a neutral colour scheme throughout, split system, ducted heating and remote double garage.
The home is within close proximity to everything the Pasadena Estate has to offer with schools in easy reach including Clyde Primary School and Lighthouse Christian College Cranbourne also not to mention the parks, shops and easy freeway access makes this home a must see.
Beds: 3 Bath: 2 Car: 2
Agent: Lana Grant
Summary of property
• Modern luxurious residence boasting comfortable, light-filled interiors
• Oversized living
• Entertainers pergola
• Sophisticated kitchen offering premium appliances and plentiful cabinetry
• Master bedroom with WIR and Ensuite
• 2 further bedrooms with WIR
• Ducted heating and split system
• Family bathroom with spa

Description:
Abutting Urban Growth Zone, Clyde 100acres
The Land
Rare opportunity exists to purchase and in the future possibly develop (STCA) this magnificent flat and fertile 100 acre property. Situated abutting the Urban Growth Zone of Clyde, off the South Gippsland Hwy:
- 8km to Cranbourne
- 15km to Berwick Shopping Centre
- 60kms to Melbourne CBD
Furthermore, this blue chip property is located amongst good company, with over 300Ha of land around the area land banked by the large development companies including Mirvac and Evolve Development.
The Homestead
Overlooking this large parcel of land the modest residence responds to contemporary family needs - and does so in a style that's rich in character and charm. Classical lines and open plan living introduce the lounge and family rooms that overlook panoramic views of this superb property. At the rear, light fills the large study/ 3rd bedroom, and main bedroom. The two other separately zoned bedrooms, share a bathroom.
Other home comforts include a large laundry, workshop and double garage.
The Facilities
With highly fertile soils, the property has been used to grow vegetables and run cattle. It features multiple paddocks, reticulated water, a bore, dam and water rights.
This is a home and land demonstrates timeless desirability and an abundance of potential in a tightly held development location.

Description:
Titled land ready to build!
CLYDE: ELISTON ESTATE
With titled land a premium, this park-side block is ideally located in the popular Eliston Estate, totalling 294m2 with a 10.5m frontage the block is located close to all current and future amenity, with ample sports grounds within walking distance and future infrastructure planned, it will be a sought after piece of land at a very affordable price point.
Clyde is located only a short drive from freeway access and all amenities in the townships of Berwick and Cranbourne. The area is surrounded by multiple shopping centres. The town centre of Clyde offers a general store, post office and a community hall and still feels like a small country town however with the benefits of being only a short distance to retail therapy, education precincts and sporting facilities. Schools in the area include Clyde Primary, Hillcrest Christian College and St.Peters College.

Description:
SOLD by Gavin Coyne 0417 309 650
Modern and comfortable, this 4y/o Burbank home on a low maintenance 210m block is perfect for a first home buyer of investor.
Appealing both inside and out, lots of natural light and a warm colour palette will make you feel at home right away. There are two bedrooms with built-in robes and one main bathroom and open study. The designer kitchen will impress your inner gourmet, with plenty of cupboards and bench space to work with, as well as quality appliances.
There is a designated meals area and a spacious open plan living space which flows outside to a private courtyard that would be the perfect space for your morning cup of tea.
Further features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and remote single garage with internal access.
In the popular Pasadena Estate, you're only moments from Shopping on Clyde and Casey Fields Sporting Complex.

O'Brien Real Estate has the perfect opportunity for the first home buyer or astute investor wanting to expand their property portfolio, presenting this near new home, positioned perfectly within walking distance to Shopping on Clyde Shopping Centre, Casey fields sporting complex, schools and public transport. Featuring:

Located within one of the fastest growing municipalities in Australia, there is an excellent opportunity for astute investors, developers and land bankers to secure these 5 acres of flat land zoned in Urban Growth Boundary (Clyde South PSP) suitable for future residential development (subject to council approval).
• This land comes with additional house

• Easy access to the Melbourne CBD via the Monash Freeway & South Gippsland Highway
• 12 minutes to Eden Rise Village Shopping Centre

Description:
One with the lot
Located in the well sought-after Pasadena estate, this quality built Carlisle Family home has features galore with nothing to do but move in and enjoy. Sure to impress the most particular of buyers, the functional floorplan boasts two separate living areas, a beautiful hostess kitchen and to top it off a fantastic entertainers area outside!
Features include:
- Generous Master bedroom with full ensuite, double vanities, double shower, and SPA bath plus a large walk in robe.
- Open plan living with central kitchen and dining area
- Hostess kitchen includes stainless steel 900mm oven, dishwasher, Caesar stone benchtops with breakfast bar, glass splash back and huge walk in pantry.
- Fully set up theatre room with projector, screen and built in speakers.
- Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling throughout the home.
- Undercover Entertainers area overlooking a generous backyard for the kids to play.
- Double remote garage with internal access.
- Other features include, downlights, high ceilings, landscaped gardens back and front and much much more.
Pasadena estate is the place to be due to a true family friendly lifestyle. Beautiful children's parks and walking tracks offer plenty of space to explore, Casey fields and Casey RACE are only a stone throw away and all this is only a moment's drive to local schools. Not to mention the property is also just a short walk to Shopping on Clyde.
Insights: 18 Green Gully Road, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2017 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Set in the Belmond estate opposite parklands, this stylish & modern home is full of upgrades and will suit first home buyers, downsizers and investors alike. Comprising 3 bedrooms with ensuite to master, stone benchtops throughout, raised ceilings, security system, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, hostess kitchen with quality 900mm appliances, study nook, lock up garage with internal access, and full landscaping including a stunning outdoor area with decked pergola & water feature. There is nothing to do, just move in and enjoy the beautiful & low maintenance lifestyle this home offers. Contact Daniel today!
